about_the_game:
Antenna Dilemma's first chapter is free and this DLC is not an expansion of the game (don't expect a new achievement or a sequel).

This DLC was created for people who would like:
  • to help us continue making games (like an Antenna Dilemma's sequel)
  • to see more about how the game was made, to have insights about game developement (first drawings, mock-ups ...)

Every file in this DLC and its description will be available only in English:
  • Game screenshots from early versions of the game
  • Mock-ups and handwritten notes about the game storymaking
  • A document which gathers all fun facts about game inspirations, easter eggs and much more
  • A dozen of original wallpapers made for this DLC
  • Original drawings of stickers made exclusively for the game by Crazy Kraken Studio
  • How to get a special "Supporter" role into the Goloso Games Discord
  • And some other surprises...

All files will be installed in Antenna Dilemma Steam folder, which is by default:
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\AntennaDilemma\Extras

name: Antenna Dilemma - Supporter's pack
short_description: A supporter's pack for the ones who want to know even more about Antenna Dilemma.
